page.title: 02WHAR HALL HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: to Henwood Mill-disused 16th century flour mill, Isolation Hospital, Henwood Lane. {Whar Hall Housing Estate} I used to live on a large council estate on the north side of Solihull. We had a house with two bedrooms so my brother and I had to share. We moved to a new three bedroomed house with a big garden on an estate that used to be farmland near to Damson Lane and Damson Parkway. It is convenient for my school and my brother goes to his secondary school on his bike. There are fields and trees all around. It is nice and quiet except when the planes fly over.
